meanings: (상태·품질 등이) good, fine, nice, (다른 것보다) better (than), superior (to)
충고와 격려 I hope you get well soon.
옷가게에서 A little brighter color would be better.

phrases.phrase: 알았어요, 그게 좋겠네요. 오늘 밤에는 너무 무리하지 말아요, 알겠죠?
meanings: 의견 말하기 Okay, that sounds great. Don't work too hard tonight, okay?

vlive.korean: 새해 복 많이 받으시면 좋겠네요 복 많이 받으세요! and Happy New Year! 듣기 View video NCT : 127💚니가좋아💚
